name: The Firefly
description:
Love is the connection that binds everything, from different realms and dimensions.

A young man made a promise to search for a guide for his little sister who passed away because of an incurable illness. Fireflies are believed to be a guide for the departed souls of loved ones.

A short yet heartwarming story about love and acceptance. The Firefly will give you an emotional journey, hopefully, that will show the love of family and friendship.
